name: FastFC
body:
### Welcome to Fast Functional Connectivity Toolbox.
This toolbox is the result of an effort to improve efficiency for Functional Connectivity measures.
You can download the executable files (right now only available for Windows x64 sytems) here. All functions are developed so that they can be called directly from Matlab's command line.

### Acknowledgements
Please do cite our work: 

### Instructions 
- Download executables from here.
- Include folder in Matlab's path.
- Make sure you have installed appropriate .dll files for multithread execution. You can download them from here -->
- Make sure you have an updated version of FFTW's .dll files. You can download them from here -->
- Enjoy!

### Contact & Support
If you have any doubt or would like to help with Fast FC, please contact me.

Juan Garcia-Prieto
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
